Source.Name: libuv
Source.Summary: A multi-platform support library with a focus on asynchronous I/O
Source.Description: libuv is a multi-platform support library with a focus on asynchronous I/O. It was primarily developed for use by Node.js, but it's also used by Luvit, Julia, pyuv, and others.
